original_text: You are living among people who do not know God. So be very careful that you always live in a good way. Sometimes these people may wrongly say that you do bad things. But if you continue to live in a good way, they will see that you really do good things. As a result, on the day when God comes as judge, they will give honour to him. Obey people who have authority over you You are living among people who do not know God. So be very careful that you always live in a good way. Sometimes these people may wrongly say that you do bad things. But if you continue to live in a good way, they will see that you really do good things. As a result, on the day when God comes as judge, they will give honour to him. Obey people who have authority over you You are living among people who do not know God. So be very careful that you always live in a good way. Sometimes these people may wrongly say that you do bad things. But if you continue to live in a good way, they will see that you really do good things. As a result, on the day when God comes as judge, they will give honour to him.
korean_text: 너희가 이방인 중에서 행실을 선하게 가져 너희를 악행한다고 비방하는 자들로 하여금 너희 선한 일을 보고 오시는 날에 하나님께 영광을 돌리게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: You are living among people
who do not know God.
So be very careful
that you always live in a good way.
Sometimes these people may wrongly say
sentences.korean_translation: 때때로 이 사람들은 잘못 말할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that you do bad things.
But if you continue to live in a good way,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너가 계속 좋은 방식으로 산다면,

sentences.original_text: they will see
that you really do good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 정말로 좋은 일을 한다는 것을.

sentences.original_text: As a result,
on the day when God comes as judge,
they will give honour to him.
Obey people who have authority over you
sentences.korean_translation: 너 위에 권위 있는 사람들을 순종하라

that you really do good things.

on the day when God comes as judge,
they will give honour to him.
